headline.main: PAINTINGS SHOWN OF WILLIAM BLARE; 28 Water-Colors Designed for Bunyan's 'Pilgrim's Progress' on View at Knoedler's

lead_paragraph: William Blake's set of twenty-eight water-colors designed for Bunyan's "Pilgrim's Progress" will be placed on view today at the Knoedler Galleries, 14 East Fifty-seventh Street. These water-colors, not previously seen in America, have been lent by the Marquess of Crewe and are to be exhibited through the courtesy also of George Macy, director of the Limited Editions Club.

keywords.value: COMMUNITY SERVICE SOC OF N Y
